meeting_annotations.transcript: So sorry Will just quick follow up so have you found that this pyroptosis mechanism works against like a broad range of bacteria viruses like in addition to the toxo model wasn't?

meeting_annotations.speaker: William Witola
meeting_annotations.transcript: Yeah, yeah, it appears to be not specific for a particular pathogen, but it kind of targets intracellular pathogens, particularly those pathogens that form uh like a vacuum once they get into a host cell because it's that vacuum that those peptides tend to latch onto and then on top of pyroptosis they also activate acidification of the vacuum which also tends to kill the intracellular pathogens.
